> Topic of week: What specific changes do need to be done to the  
www.fsgames.com website? 

Hmm.  If we can ever figure out how to export maps of scenarios into 
gif or jpg files, I would want pictures of maps of all the original 
scenarios posted on the site. (since the source code is available, 
does that make that project any easier?)  Heck, I would want it set up 
where you could click on the map and see the story for that scenario.
